to hide a thing, fact etc. from another.
to escape; to get away; to evade.
the act of cheating, deceiving.
not straight; crooked; bent.
the rattan, Calamus polygamus ( = C. flagellum) of Arecaceae family, the slender, long stems which are used in making furniture.
another rattan, Calamus rotang of the same family.
the tree Ougeinia oojeinensis ( = O. dalbergioides, = Dalbergia ougeinensis) of Papilionaceae family.
the tree Jonesia asoca ( = Saraca indica) of Caesalpiniaceae family; Ashoka tree.
a kind of bird.
a servant; an attendant; a helper.
a dividing or being divided.
he who divides; a divider.
a part or portion of a whole; a share.
an unmarried man; a bachelor.
a room in a building for the preparation and cooking of food; a kitchen.
a kind of ear-ornament.
the large, deciduous tree Artocarpus lakoocha of Moraceae family the wood of which is used for making furniture.
its fruit used in making pickles.
